threats.title: Spoofing
threats.description: User may spoofed by an attacker and get access to their OLA account and other credentials.

threats.title: Authorization
threats.description: Attacker can access to the information which is not authorized to them.

threats.title: Cookie scraping
threats.description: Attacker can take over the user session when user logs into a particular service like internet banking.
threats.mitigation:
Clear cookies regularly
Install a trusted antivirus
Avoid clicking suspicious links.

threats.description: Users may deny that they booked for OLA service
threats.title: Repudiation

threats.description: Attackers may persuade into website by accessing to the password user has chosen.
threats.title: Phishing
threats.mitigation:
Two factor authentication
Implementing federated or single sign on.

threats.title: Data tampering
threats.description: Attacker may insert malicious file that change the configuration of database, modify user credentials to gain access to sensitive data.
threats.mitigation:
File Integrity Monitoring
Hash-based message authentication code.
Enforce Encryption for Data.

threats.title: Denial of Service Attack
threats.description: Attackers can flood of traffic from users and may crash database accessibility.
threats.mitigation:
Blocking malicious web requests.
Archiving external data and encrypting databases.
